scripts.start:
echo "Node.js 6 is required.
" && npm run compile-server && node target/server/entrypoint.js
scripts.compile-ui: npm run protoc && npm run jsx -s && java -jar bin/compiler-react.jar --js=src/closure-library/closure/goog/**.js --js=src/closure-library/third_party/**.js --js=src/end-to-end/src/javascript/crypto/e2e/**.js --js='!src/end-to-end/src/javascript/crypto/e2e/extension/helper/**.js' --js=!src/end-to-end/src/javascript/crypto/e2e/extension/externs.js --js=src/react/react-0.13.1-build/react.js --js=src/reflect-common/**.js --js=src/whisp/client/**.js --js=zlib.js/**.js --js='!src/**test.js' --js='!src/**/*test*/**/*.js' --js=src/end-to-end/lib/docs-build/zlib_externs.js --js=src/protobuf/js/**.js --js=!src/protobuf/js/commonjs --js=!src/protobuf/js/gulpfile.js --js=src/proto/closure/*.js --js_output_file='target/client/output-compiled-ui.js.tmp' --charset=utf-8 --compilation_level=ADVANCED_OPTIMIZATIONS --summary_detail_level=3 --warning_level=VERBOSE --debug=true --source_map_format=V3 --language_in=ECMASCRIPT6 --language_out=ECMASCRIPT5 --output_wrapper=';(function(){%output%})();' --externs=src/externs.js --externs=src/redux-externs.js --externs=src/redux-thunk-externs.js --formatting=PRETTY_PRINT --define='goog.DEBUG=true' --define='jspb.Message.GENERATE_TO_OBJECT=true' --entry_point=goog:whisp.ui.EntryPoint && npm run concat -s
scripts.compile-server: npm run clean-server && npm run copy-server && cd ./src/whisp
scripts.concat: npm run clean-ui && cat node_modules/redux/dist/redux.min.js >> target/client/output-compiled-ui.js && cat node_modules/redux-thunk/dist/redux-thunk.min.js >> target/client/output-compiled-ui.js && cat target/client/output-compiled-ui.js.tmp >> target/client/output-compiled-ui.js && npm run clean-ui-tmp
scripts.concat-with-router: cat node_modules/redux/dist/redux.min.js >> target/client/output-compiled-ui.js && cat node_modules/redux-thunk/dist/redux-thunk.min.js >> target/client/output-compiled-ui.js && cat node_modules/react-router/umd/ReactRouter.min.js >> target/client/output-compiled-ui.js
